1.content: How old are our kids gonna be?
1.title: Age

111.content: Congratulations! It's a boy! But how old is he?
111.title: Male.

1112.content:
Well, not exactly 0, but closer to that.

Who will we follow?

Abel Cliff, 3 months.

Thomas Elbert, 6 months.
1112.title: Zero.

choices: He stands, but doesn't get the bottle.
11121.content:
Abel Cliff was crawling around on the floor, when he noticed his bottle on the coffee table.
He reached up, but couldn't get it, so he tried standing up.
Does he succeed?
11121.title: Abel

choices: No, he was an only child.
11122.content:
Once upon a time there was a six-month-old boy.
His name was Thomas Elbert, and he was the loving son of Patricia and Landon Elbert.
Did Thomas have any siblings?
11122.title: Thomas

11123.content:
What other baby boys are there?

Nathan Peters, just born.

Justin Fenwick, 4 months.
11123.title: Other

112.content: How old is the baby girl?
112.title: Female.

1211.content:
Corey, 1 year 6 months: Considering that he was a quick developer with regards to crawling and sitting and walking, Corey's parents think it's time to potty train early. But is it a false start, or a true beginning?

Lance, 1 year 2 months: Lance is a late bloomer-he hasn't even started walking yet, and the closest he's said to a word is "dadehdou" when pointing at his daddy.
1211.title: One.

12111.content:
"I think we should start potty training Corey," said Letitia Matthews to her husband Bud.
"Potty training him?!" said Bud, "But he's only a year and a half old!"
"I know," said Letitia, "but he crawled at five months, sat up at three, and walked at eight."
"I suppose that is true," said Bud.

They decided to potty train Corey to use...
12111.title: Corey

12112.content:
"Dadehdou!" said Lance, pointing at his father Joseph.
"That's right," said Joseph, "Daddy!".
"I'm worried about him," said his mother Elaine, "He can't even walk yet."
"He's just a late bloomer," said Joseph.
What happens now?
12112.title: Lance

121121.content: What is he going to be fed?
121121.title: It's time to feed Lance.

12113.content:
How about these?

Gary Cline, nearly two years old, a picky eater.

Toby Woodley, just having his first birthday.
12113.title: Other

choices: Jake, 18 months, and loving running-especially away from baths or diaper changes
1212.title: Two.

12121.content:
"Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday, dear Dimitri, happy birthday to you!" sang everyone.
Dimitri blew out his candles and everyone cheered.
When the cake was gone, it was time for...
12121.title: Dimitri, celebrating his 2nd birthday!

12122.content:
(Technically 18 months means the same thing as one and a half...)

Where will Jake be running today?
12122.title: Jake, 18 months, and loving running-especially ...

choices: He's just being put into a different kind of diaper.
121222.content: What was in Jake's diaper right now?
121222.title: Away from a diaper change.

1212224.content: What different kind of diaper?
1212224.title: He's just being put into a different kind o...

12123.content:
Who else is there?

Wyatt, starting a new daycare.

Adam, whose mother is expecting.
12123.title: Other.

131.content:
Here are some choices:

-Alvin Trey, age 3.
Alvin's a bit developmentally behind-still uses a crib, high chair, and diapers. However, his parents would like to change that soon. Especially given that Alvin has a little brother, Jude, age 1, and his mother is pregnant with another baby...

-Joshua Alworth, age 2.5
Joshua is in the middle of potty training, and is really excited about being a big boy and trying to be like his big sister Ruby. However, his body is a little young for it, and accidents are semi-frequent... is it back to diapers, or can Joshua be a big boy and get into undies?
131.title: Male.

1311.content:
It was nine P.M.

Elizabeth Trey ran excitedly, but quietly so as not to wake her sons Alvin and Jude, into the bedroom where her husband, Abraham, was sitting up in bed reading.

"The test came back positive!" said Elizabeth in an excited squeak.
"Wow, honey," said Abraham, "Just think: in a few months, we'll have a third bundle of joy."

"I know," said a still-excited Elizabeth, "But I do have one nitpick: I want to have Alvin out of his crib, out of his highchair, and potty trained by the time the baby comes. Buying all those diapers is expensive and I don't want to end up needing three cribs and three high chairs."

What happens now?
1311.title: Alvin.

131121.content:
Then, the door opened, and to both parents' surprise, there was Alvin!
He had always been a bit "behind", but now, he was obviously catching up as he'd gotten out of his crib!
His room was at the other side of the hallway, so he hadn't heard the conversation.
He had entered the parents' room because...
131121.title: Alvin wakes up.

choices: He was getting stir-crazy stuck in his crib.
1311213.content: He had entered his parent's room because...
1311213.title: Other.

choices: "My you're a clever boy, coming out of your crib."
"You're going to learn some new things tomorrow."
"Your mom's going to have a baby."
13112131.content:
"I need a diaper change," said Alvin.
"OK," said Abraham, taking him into the bathroom.
While changing the diaper, Abraham said....
13112131.title: He needed a diaper change.

choices: Tell him that nighttime is for sleeping, but promise him fun in the morning.
13112132.content:
"I'm bored," said Alvin, "I woke up but it was still dark, there's nothing to do!"
What do the parents do?
13112132.title: He was bored.

13112133.content:
"I'm hungry," said Alvin.
"OK," said Elizabeth, "You can have a cracker, but nothing fancy because you've brushed your teeth and don't want to get them dirty again."
So Alvin ate his cracker.
Does Elizabeth tell Alvin she's pregnant then?
13112133.title: He was hungry.

choices: Put him back to bed and promise they'll accompany him in the morning.
Stay with him at his crib until he falls asleep.
Let him sleep in their bed.
13112134.content:
"Wow," said Abraham, "You got out of your crib! I didn't know you could do that!"
"Why?" asked Elizabeth.
"Because I'm lonely," said Alvin, "I don't like waking up at night!"
What do the parents do?
13112134.title: He was getting stir-crazy stuck in his crib.

131122.content:
Then, both parents heard a loud crying noise from the bedroom of one-year-old Jude.
They went into the room to see what was going on.
It turned out that Jude....
131122.title: Jude starts crying.

choices: Alvin was starting to wake up a bit.
1311222.content:
Jude's diaper sagged in his onesie, clearly soiled.

"Oh, it's okay, let's get you out of that." Abraham said, taking Jude to the changing table and soothing him.

Meanwhile, Elizabeth checked in on Alvin's room to make sure he hadn't been woken up.
1311222.title: Needed a diaper change.

13112221.content:
Alvin was still asleep, so Elizabeth went back to bed.
When Abraham had finished changing Jude's diaper, everyone went back to bed.
What happens now?
13112221.title: Alvin was still asleep.

13112222.content:
Alvin was starting to wake up.
"Go back to sleep, it's not morning," said Elizabeth.
Does Alvin fall back asleep?
13112222.title: Alvin was starting to wake up a bit.

choices: Let Alvin fall asleep on his own.
13112223.content:
Alvin was awake.
"Mommy?" he said.
What does Elizabeth do?
13112223.title: Alvin was fully awake.

choices: Something that had been cooking was ready.
131123.content: Suddenly, Abraham's watch timer went off, which meant...
131123.title: Abraham's watch timer goes off.

choices: They heard a cat meowing outside.
131124.title: Something else.

choices: Abraham took Alvin, while Elizabeth took care of Jude.
Abraham got Jude, and Elizabeth handled Alvin.
They both went to Alvin first, and then Jude.
They both got Jude taken care of, before going to Alvin.
13113.content: The morning came, and the mom and dad got up to take care of their sons.
13113.title: Skip to the morning.

131131.content:
Abraham wandered into Alvin's room.
"Good morning, Alvin!" he said.
"Morning," said Alvin sleepily.
Abraham then lifted Alvin out of his crib and checked his diaper.

Meanwhile, Elizabeth was checking Jude's diaper.
Do any of them need changing?
131131.title: Abraham took Alvin, while Elizabeth took care o...

choices: Jude needed a change, but Alvin was clean.
Alvin needed a fresh diaper, but Jude was dry.
1311311.title: One of them.

1311312.content:
''Whoa, that's one full diaper you got there little guy!'' Abraham says as he lifts up Alvin and inspects his diaper and carries him to the changing table. And indeed, Alvin had indeed soaked his diaper during the night, as per usual. Elizabeth carries Jude out of his room and waits for Abraham to be done with changing Alvin's diaper so she can in turn give Jude a change. ''We really gotta step up with getting Alvin out of diapers, not to mention the crib and other stuff, I mean he's 3.'' she says in a slightly frustrated tone.

''Just give it some time, he'll get there eventually'' Abraham says and tries to reassure Elizabeth. After both have been changed and fed, one of the parents heads to work and one stays at home with the boys. Which one stays with them?
1311312.title: Both of them.

choices: ...his old cloth trainers from when Abraham was potty training.
...those Pull-Ups Aunt Martha had passive-aggressively given them as a gift.
13113121.content:
While Elizabeth heads out the door, Abraham picks up his sons and heads into the living room.

Alvin isn't hungry... And naptime won't be for a while. Which means the only thing we can start working on is the potty. He thought.

"Stay here, kids, daddy needs to check for something." he says as he puts Jude in a playpen and Alvin on the floor. Abraham dashes off to one of the closets, looking for something...
13113121.title: Abraham

choices: Lets Alvin examine the Pull Ups
131131212.content:
After a bit of rummaging through the closet Abraham finds what he's looking for. ''There they are!'' he says to himself and takes out a package of Pull Ups, still unopened. When they last visited Aunt Martha she was shocked at Alvin still being nowhere near potty trained, or not even close to starting, to be exact. So she gave his son's old Pull Ups to them as a ''gift'', hinting that it would be high time for Alvin to learn the ways of the potty.

Abraham then returns to the living room. ''Alvin, daddy wants to show you something.'' he starts, getting Alvin's attention. He opens up the package and takes a Pull Up out. ''Look Alvin, how about you try these!'' Alvin gives him a confused look so Abraham explains. ''These are new kind of diapers for you, they're a bit like undies but still hold pee and poop in them. But you can put these on and take them off all by yourself!'' He then takes off Alvin's diaper and helps Alvin put on the Pull Up.

Alvin doesn't seem to really understand or care about the difference, to him they seem to be just diapers without the tapes. Then Abraham...
131131212.title: ...those Pull-Ups Aunt Martha had passive-aggre...

choices: He wears one as a hat.
He loves the Toy Story and Cars designs on the front.
He gets bored and plays with his actual toys.
1311312121.content:
Abraham, realizing that he's being a bit forceful, lets back a bit. He takes out a few Pull-Ups and puts them in front of Alvin for him to play with. He then backs off, pulling out his laptop to do some research on potty training. He finds a quiz for "signs of readiness" and starts going through it.

Alvin, meanwhile, starts playing with the Pull-Ups.
1311312121.title: Lets Alvin examine the Pull Ups

13113121212.content:
Alvin looks at the Pull Ups and spots some familiar looking characters on the front. ''There's Buzz and Woody!'' he announces in an excited voice and giggles a bit when holding one of the Pull Ups. He then proceeds to remove all the Pull Ups from the package to get a closer look at them, and much to his excitement he finds some with design from Cars at the front. ''These are cool!'' he says, smiling.

His inspection of the new Pull Ups is interrupted when Jude...
13113121212.title: He loves the Toy Story and Cars designs on the ...

choices: They had always been friendly and loving towards each other.
It was rocky when Jude was born, but it had mended over time.
Sibling rivalry didn't even begin to explain it.
131131212122.content:
Jude, who was in the middle of his playpen, crawled over to the place closest to Alvin, and looked at him.

What was Alvin and Jude's relationship like?
131131212122.title: Crawls to him

choices: Picks Jude up on his lap
1311312121221.content: Alvin had always liked his little brother since he was born and eagerly waited for Jude to be a bit older so he could really play with him, since being just one Jude's participation was a bit limited. He happily turns to Jude and asks ''What's up little bro?'' Jude answers with a giggle and some baby talk, making Alvin smile some more. Alvin then...
1311312121221.title: They had always been friendly and loving toward...

choices: ...scolded Alvin a little, and put back Jude in his playpen.
...let the brothers have their moment, finishing the "signs of readiness" quiz.
13113121212212.content:
Alvin stood up and took hold of Jude, pulling him out of his playpen and onto the floor. He sat him on his lap and poked Jude's tummy, making Jude giggle.

Abraham saw this, and in response...
13113121212212.title: Picks Jude up on his lap

131131212122122.content:
Abraham lets the brothers enjoy their company as he finishes up the quiz. According to the results Alvin doesn't appear to be quite ready yet, but Abraham thinks it's still worth a try, even if it'll be a slow start.

He puts the laptop away and sits on the floor next to he boys, and when he does he catches the smell of a poopy diaper. Which brother is the cause?
131131212122122.title: ...let the brothers have their moment, finishin...

1311312121221221.content:
Abraham first checks Alvin's diaper, but finds it to be clean, it's not even wet. So he picks up Jude and says ''Someone is stinky! Lets get that diapy changed'' He then gets and idea, he decides to ask if Alvin would like to help changing his little brother, thinking it would make him feel like a big boy and encourage him to get out of diapers sooner.

''Hey champ, would you like to help me change Jude's diaper?'' Abraham asks. What does Alvin say?
1311312121221221.title: Jude

choices: ...Gives him a toy a few feet away.
13113121212212211.content:
Alvin nods and waddles behind Abraham as he gets out the portable changing mat kept in the living room on the floor and lays Jude on it.

"Hold him down while I get the stuff." Abraham says, as he walks to get the fresh diaper, wipes and cream. Alvin puts his hand on Jude's tummy to keep him from flipping or rolling or crawling or walking away, but to have a little fun, Alvin...
13113121212212211.title: ''Yeah sure!''

choices: Neither, he wants to put the new diaper on Jude
131131212122122113.content:
Alvin grabs a teddy bear and gives it to Jude, effectively distracting his brother while Abraham returns with the changing supplies. ''Okay, let's get you changed up'' Abraham says and opens the tapes of Jude's diaper. ''Eww! Stinky!'' Alvin says and pinches his nose.

Alvin continues distracting Jude with the teddy bear while Abraham cleans up Jude and slides a new diaper under his backside. Wanting to give Alvin a chance to help some more, telling him he can either put some baby powder on Jude or go throw away the dirty diaper. Alvin wants to...
131131212122122113.title: ...Gives him a toy a few feet away.

1311312121221221132.content:
Abraham holds the diaper, closed, and hands it over to Alvin. "Take it to the him in your room, next to the changing table. You open it by putting your foot on the pedal on the bottom."

Alvin toddles off, and...
1311312121221221132.title: Throw away the diaper

choices: "If Alvin doesn't even like changing Jude, how will he use the potty?"
"Maybe I can use Jude to help motivate Alvin to go potty?"
"Man, 3 kids in diapers at once does not sound good. Better get Alvin ready."
13113121212212212.content:
The idea of actually changing Jude's diaper is enough to make Alvin cringe. "Eww, no!" he says, scurrying off so he won't be dragged into it.

Abraham sighs as he takes Jude to the changing table to put him in a fresh, clean diaper. As he goes through the familiar dance of wipes, powder, rash cream and diapers, his thoughts go somewhere else.
13113121212212212.title: ''Eww, no!''

131131212122122123.content:
“Man, three kids in diapers all at once does not sound good. Better get Alvin ready.” Abraham says, changing Jude’s diaper in record time. Having three kids really helped with those skills!

He sets Jude out in the room and asks Alvin, getting down on his knees so that he could talk to the kid, eye to eye, “Do you have to pee or poop kiddo?”

Alvin responded with...
131131212122122123.title: "Man, 3 kids in diapers at once...

1311312122.content:
Abraham dashed off to the bathroom next to the master bedroom, where they had stored the other potty thingy-the training toilet.

He pulled it out of it's hiding place above the actual toilet, on the top shelf, and ran back down stairs, putting it on the floor in front of Alvin.

"You're gonna use this now!" Abraham said enthusiastically, as he picked Alvin up and put him on the training potty...
1311312122.title: Brings out a training potty

131132.content:
Abraham walked in and lifted Jude out of his crib.
Meanwhile, Elizabeth went in to check on Alvin.
Both parents checked their sons' diapers, does anyone need a change?
131132.title: Abraham got Jude, and Elizabeth handled Alvin.

1311321.content: Which one of the kids had wet their night diaper?
1311321.title: One of them.

13113212.content:
Not only wet his diaper, but pooped in it as well. He was very embarressed about it because his parents didnt like it when he pooped in his diapers. They said pee accidents happened easier but he should poop in the potty. But he wasnt feeling well and his tummy was icky.
His mum said "baby do you still have to go potty?"
He nodded.
Does he have to...
13113212.title: Alvin had.

131132122.content:
"I have to go poopie mummy" he said shyly. Abraham took jude downstairs while alvins mother helped him.
She asked him "do you want to..
131132122.title: Go poop

choices: Jude had pooed, and Alvin had wet.
Jude had wet, and Alvin had pooed.
1311322.title: Both of them.

131133.content:
The parents went into Alvin's room.
"Good morning, Alvin!" they said.
"Good morning," said Alvin, standing up in his crib as Elizabeth put the side of the crib down.
Abraham then checked Alvin's diaper.
It was...
131133.title: They both went to Alvin first, and then Jude.

choices: Abnormal-he normally woke up wet or dirty.
Becoming more and more normal-he was breaking even dry and wet.
Normal-he really only wore diapers to bed because of the few times he had wet.
1311333.title: Dry.

1312.content:
"I need a new Pull-Up," said Joshua to his father Dennis one morning.
"Let me get you one, said Dennis, as Joshua went into the bathroom and took off his Pull-Up.
"It's not fair," said Joshua, "Ruby doesn't wear Pull-Ups."
"Well, Ruby's six and you're not even three yet," said Dennis.

Once Joshua was out of his Pull-Up....
1312.title: Joshua.

13123.content: Once Joshua was out of his old Pull-Up...
13123.title: Other.

1313.content:
Other options:

Sid, age two, wants to go camping like his big brother Albert but is scared of the dark.

Maurie, age three, a very curious boy who wants to learn to swim.
1313.title: Other options.

132.content: How old is our little girl?
132.title: Female.

1321.content: Alright the little girl is 2, whats her name?
1321.title: Two.

choices: Day Trained (Wearing Nighttime Pullups and Pajamas)
Just starting potty training (Wearing Thin Nighttime Diaper and Pajamas)
Hasn’t even started (Wearing a Thick Nighttime Diaper and Pajamas)
13212.content: Alright, we join our little girl Janice who is just now waking up with a very cute yawn, the question remains however... is she potty trained?
13212.title: Janice

141.content: How old is the boy?
141.title: Male.

1411.content:
Leo: You know the "Terrible twos"? Leo never left that stage. He's argumentative, tantrumy, and always wants to do things his way, resisting every change that comes his way. This means, he's still in diapers, hates baths and bedtimes, and wants absolutely nothing to do with fruits and veggies.

Keith: In direct contrast, Keith is a laid-back toddler. He loves to play, but he's pretty much cool with everything... but this lack of care means that Keith is "potty trained", by which they mean "We have a schedule where we take Keith to go potty at certain times", but Keith never actually initiates going potty.
1411.title: Three.

choices: His parents were trying to get him to eat.
14111.content: "No!" shouted Leo. It was his favorite word. If there was any reason for Leo to argue or complain, he would. Right now, he was saying his favorite word, "no", because...
14111.title: Leo

142.content: How old is the girl?
142.title: Female.

151.content: How old is our young boy?
151.title: Male.

15111.content:
So, a four-year-old boy who's potty trained.
What's his name?
15111.title: Yes

15112.content:
Who do we focus on?

Ike: A stubborn boy 4 years and 2 months old, Ike does not want to give up the diapers. However, with the deadline of preschool that requires at least Pull-Ups on the horizon, will his parents have to sweeten the deal, or force him to go unprepared?

Oscar: 4 years and 6 months old, Oscar has autism, which has stunted his mental maturity. His family supports and cares for him, even as he soils his pants day in and day out. But is there light at the end of the tunnel for him?

Richard: 4 years, 9 months, Richard failed potty training once, at the age of 2, and the memories have left him scarred. But when he begins waking up with dry diapers in the morning, it gives him hope to try and use the potty once again... can he do it?
15112.title: No

151121.content: Ike was a stubborn boy, steadfast in not giving up his diapers. He would hide whenever he would have to pee or poop. Currently, he was hiding and...
151121.title: Ike

choices: In a small space in the living room between a chair and a corner.
Inside the closet, in the hallway on the second floor.
In the bathroom, inside the shower stall.
Under a bed-either his own, his sibling's, or his parent's.
1511211.content: Ike was wetting his diaper in a secret place. Where was that place?
1511211.title: Peeing

15113.content:
Allright, here's some character options.

Diego Guiterrez, 4 years and one month. After a disastrous attempt at toilet training when he was 2, things have mostly calmed down, and Diego has warmed up to using the potty again. He's only just started, but with a bit of luck, maybe he'll get trained!

Lance Skains, 4 years and 6 months. Right in the middle of training, Lance got hit with a nasty cold that sent him back into diapers for a few days. But will it be a minor stumble, or a major setback?

Zachariah "Zach" James, 4 years and 9 months. Zach had been going strong, a week or two away from finishing potty training. But when his baby sister, Judith, is born, he finds himself increasingly ignored as his mother and father care for the new baby-and accidents are the only thing that get him attention. But will this bad habit be broken, or will he become dependent on the diaper once more?
15113.title: In-progress

152.content: How old is the girl?
152.title: Female.

info.brief_description: Play as baby boys and baby girls, toddler boys and toddler girls, throughout their days.
info.description:
Rules:
Keep it family friendly.
Keep it light.
